error.msg:
org.apache.solr.search.SyntaxError: Cannot parse ':': Encountered " ":" ": "" at line 1, column 0.
Was expecting one of:
    <NOT> ...
    "+" ...
    "-" ...
    <BAREOPER> ...
    "(" ...
    "*" ...
    <QUOTED> ...
    <TERM> ...
    <PREFIXTERM> ...
    <WILDTERM> ...
    <REGEXPTERM> ...
    "[" ...
    "{" ...
    <LPARAMS> ...
    "filter(" ...
    <NUMBER> ...
    <TERM> ...
